lore: Some believe Marionettes are consciousâ€”there are even folk stories about itâ€”but studies say otherwise.\n\nThe Marionette Primadonna is a gifted singer who knows how to command attention at any party. In high society, a celebration isn't truly proper unless one of these Marionettes is the host.
menagerieDialog: (It hangs limply, awaiting its next command.)
Pull my strings and watch me dance... a dance of death!
I may be controlled, but my mind is my own. Let me share my observations with you.
You can't hurt what isn't truly alive. I am invincible!
(It's jerking about wildly, its limbs flailing in all directions.)
name: Marionette Primadonna
